content: Why I started this one?Since my mostly 5 years on forum, I know of some free contributions from our community, for forum avatar, signature and other things related to Bitcoin, security.Recently, Pmalek started a questionable topic: Forum advertising space for free signature/avatar advertisement Pmalek has some similar and different objectives than what I did in the past as well as in this topic.In this topicI collect arts from community for everyone to use it. No advertisement here in either Free or Paid mode.If anyone has your free arts, please share here. I much appreciate it.Bitcointalk.org forum's signatures & avatarsNotYourKeys.org - Community Contribution Avatar CampaignTwo categories might be more in futureAvatarSignatureAvatarI kind of like to have similar avatars but without that website link but it is what I can get from their past campaign.cryptosec.info            Insanerman

I thought its okay for my rank, just realized that there is for sr. too, although the hero/legendary doesn't have the label.Quote from: tranthidung on July 19, 2022, 07:54:59 AMQuote from: theymos on February 26, 2014, 09:15:18 PMPerhaps the allowed signature styling should change with activity score / membergroup. Like:- Newbie: No styling (including links) allowed. Max 40 characters.- Jr. Member: Links allowed. Max 100 characters.- Member: Unlimited length.- Full: Color allowed.- Sr. Member: Size allowed- Hero: Background color allowedThen newbies will be less effective advertisers, which would hopefully significantly reduce the incentive for low-content posts. And when people become capable of effectively advertising through their signatures, they'll have invested a lot of time into their accounts, and they won't risk being banned by spamming.Another, refresher, I just forgot how the heck this signature works, oof.-Signature, updated. Thanks.
